titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Abraham Lincoln Brigade Archives Vertical Files: Subjects ALBA.VF.001
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Tamiment Staff

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2012-03-29T14:27-0400

did.unittitle: Abraham Lincoln Brigade Archives Vertical Files: Subjects
did.abstract: The Abraham Lincoln Brigade Archives (ALBA) Vertical Files are a rich source for background information on the people, events and topics related to the ALBA collections in the Tamiment Library and include coverage of the International Brigades as well. The files contain a variety of documents such as newspaper clippings, flyers, brochures, biographical material, anniversary and exhibit programs, obituaries, and other items. Consult the folder list in this collection to find material on specific events or topics. See the ALBA Vertical File on Individuals to find biographical material on specific individuals.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of files of printed ephemera such as broadsides, brochures, bulletins, catalogs, clippings, flyers, leaflets, manifestoes, pamphlets, press releases, reports, reprints and other documents relating to a broad range of subjects connected with the Abraham Lincoln Brigade.

custodhist.head: Provenance
custodhist.p: The provenance of the materials is varied. Items were obtained through purchases, donations, standing orders with publishers, arrangements with organizations and bookstores, exchanges with other libraries, and through ongoing collecting by Tamiment staff.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
Permission to publish materials must be obtained in writing from the:
Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Elmer Holmes Bobst Library
70 Washington Square South
New York, NY 10012
Phone: (212) 998-2630
Fax: (212) 995-4225
E-mail: gail.malmgreen@nyu.edu

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p:
Published citations should take the following form:
Identification of item, date (if known); The ALBA Vertical Files: Subjects; VF 1; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive; New York University Libraries.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged into one series: Series I: ALBA Subject Files. Folders are arranged alphabetically.
